abstract: Pope Francis is expected to release papal encyclical that will make case that climate change is increasing suffering of poor around world, but Catholic Church leaders are wary of message in United States, where topic of global warming is controversial; American Catholics are largely more conservative than Francis on number of issues.
lead_paragraph: American leaders of the Catholic Church, a group shaped by Francis’s conservative predecessors, are hesitant about becoming involved in a cause championed by Francis.

headline.main: Pope Francis May Find Wariness Among U.S. Bishops on Climate Change
headline.print_headline: Francis May Find Wariness Among U.S. Bishops

snippet: American leaders of the Catholic Church, a group shaped by Francis’s conservative predecessors, are hesitant about becoming involved in a cause championed by Francis.

keywords.value: United States Conference of Catholic Bishops
keywords.name: organizations
